item.title: TLS Certificate Cheat Sheet: OpenSSL & Curl Edition
item.description: This post is a practical collection of OpenSSL and curl commands for generating keys, creating CSRs, inspecting certificates, and testing TLS connections. Private and Public Keys # Create private key, 4096-bit RSA or ed25519 openssl genrsa -out key.pem 4096 openssl genpkey -algorithm ed25519 -out key.pem # Show the public key of a private key in key.pem openssl pkey -in key.pem -pubout # Get sha256+base64 fingerprint (as needed for `curl --pinnedpubkey`) openssl pkey -in key.
